text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Homn nomn... High heat detected: steamed meat bun. Negative effect Burn identified.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
However, the consumption of 1 bun is 
required to replenish the calories lost 
in training.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
Next training starts in... 3m. Switching
to <color=blue>Cooling</color> mode to attempt consumption.
